c74object.name: fl.clip~
c74object.digest: Clips the incoming frame to the range delimited by the two parameters.
c74object.description: Calculation is performed on triplets of values in turn. The output is a frame at least as long as the leftmost frame. If inputs mismatch in length the result depends on the mismatch parameter.

entry.name: 1. /mismatch [instantiation enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode used when dealing with mismatched input lengths:
wrap - smaller right inputs are read modulo against larger left input.
shrink - the output length is set to the length of the smaller input.
extend - smaller right inputs are extended by repeating their final value.
[0] - wrap [1] - shrink [2] - extend
